justification: “The Barratt Impulsiveness Scale (BIS-11) is a self-report questionnaire designed to assess impulsivity through 30 items.”

measured_by: Youth Self Report Attention Problems subscale (YSR_AT)
justification: “The Youth Self-Report (YSR)… items are organized into nine problem subscales. The three subscales attention problems (YSR_AT)… were included as a proxy of impulsive behaviour.”

measured_by: Youth Self Report Aggressive Behaviour subscale (YSR_AG)
justification: “The three subscales attention problems (YSR_AT), aggressive behaviour (YSR_AG), and rule breaking behaviour (YSR_RBB) show high concurrent validity… Sample items include ‘I argue a lot’ for the YSR_AG subscale.”
